title: Machete Kills Again... In Space
description: In a land beyond space and time. A new world enslaved. This is a land in need of a hero.
quote: This is a new network. It’s all galactic and shit.
altHero: Machete, with starry space behind him, holds his machete which is glowing like a light saber
alt2: Alexa Vega as Killjoy, wielding a huge gun
alt3: Lady Gaga as La Camaleón also holding a huge gun
alt4: Machete and the Man in the Silver Mask fight with glowing weapons
